jodd.mail

Class SmtpServer<T extends SmtpServer<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.mail.MailServer<SendMailSession>
      • jodd.mail.SmtpServer<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmtpSslServer

    public class SmtpServer<T extends SmtpServer<T>>
extends MailServer<SendMailSession>
    Represents simple plain SMTP server for sending emails.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class jodd.mail.MailServer
